Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.CodexRelated

Class CodexGUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.CodexRelated.CodexGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
Direct Known Subclasses:
CodexOthers
public class CodexGUI extends Object implements Observer
This class represents the codex of the player in the GUI

  • Constructor Details

    • CodexGUI

      public CodexGUI()
      Creates a new CodexGUI. It initializes the codex and sets the background as well as all the listeners to user input.

  • Method Details

    • attachToCodex

      public void attachToCodex()
      Attaches the codex to the codex of the player and to the party.

    • getCodex

      public javafx.scene.layout.Pane getCodex()
      Returns the pane that contains the codex.
      Returns:
      the pane that contains the codex.

    • getGridPosition

      public javafx.geometry.Point2D getGridPosition(javafx.geometry.Point2D point)
      Get the position of a point in the grid space given its position in the codex space. The codex space is a space where the center of the codex is the origin and the x-axis is the horizontal axis of the grid space, expressed in pixels. The grid space is the same coordinate system used in the model where the center of the grid is the origin and the x-axis is the horizontal axis expressed in card units.
      Parameters:
      point - The point in the codex space
      Returns:
      The position of the point in the grid space

    • addToCodex

      public void addToCodex(javafx.scene.Node node)
      Adds a node to the codex. This method also takes care of the order of the nodes in the codex ensuring that the pawn is always on top of the start card but behind the other cards.
      Parameters:
      node - the node to add.

    • addCard

      public void addCard(CardGUI card, Position position)
      Adds a card to the codex. The card's position and scale are set according to the codex space.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to add.
      position - the position of the card in the grid space.

    • setCenter

      public void setCenter(double x, double y)
      Sets the center of the codex.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the center.
      y - the y coordinate of the center.

    • setCenter

      public void setCenter(javafx.geometry.Point2D center)
      Sets the center of the codex.
      Parameters:
      center - the center of the codex.

    • getTargetPlayer

      public String getTargetPlayer()
      Returns the nickname of the target player.
      Returns:
      the nickname of the target player.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the codex according to the light codex. This is called by the Observer pattern.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer

    • snapToFrontier

      public FrontierCardGUI snapToFrontier(javafx.geometry.Point2D point)
      Returns the frontier card that is closest to the given point.
      Parameters:
      point - the point to snap from.
      Returns:
      the frontier card that is closest to the given point.

    • toggleFrontier

      public void toggleFrontier(boolean isFrontierVisible)
      Toggles the visibility of the frontier.
      Parameters:
      isFrontierVisible - true if the frontier is visible, false otherwise.

    • getScale

      public double getScale()
      Returns the scale of the codex.
      Returns:
      the scale of the codex.

    • removeCard

      public void removeCard(CardGUI card)
      Removes a card from the codex.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to remove.
